str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: (originally: I shall go out), I go out (away), depart. From ek and eimi; to issue, i.e. Leave, escape.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Meanwhile, afterwards, between. From meta and a form of sun; betwixt; as adjective, intervening, or adjoining.
